BoastHouse
September 24, 2017, Michele worked with Dana in the same group

Michele is hands-down one of the most brilliant, highly-intuitive, forward-thinking leaders I have ever had the opportunity to work with and it is always an honor when I can be a part of her team. I like to call Michele a "Greatness Maker" which means that being on a team with her equals innovative and great products far beyond the status quo. Michele's support and partnership means you would have an advocate who helps you unleash your best talents, helps you quickly remove any blocks you may encounter when working on projects, and who guarantees that you would have an honest, trustworthy partner to help you ship beautiful products. She is the best mix of analytical and creative, direct and compassionate, honest and raw. And while all of this references work, it applies to your personal life too.... Michele is a true friend whose mission is help people be the greatest they can be. I am forever grateful to have her in my life and strongly encourage others to reach out to her too.
Dana Dyksterhuis

Michele is a results focused individual.  She challenges individuals and organizations to remove barriers that are preventing success and greatness.  Michele McCarthy is a 2 a.m. friend.  An individual that one  could contact at that time of the day with any issue and she would be there to support and assist.  Michele impacts society in a positive way each and every day of her life.  Michele is creative in her approach in leading organizations to looking outside the confines of their existing organization.  Her company and she in particular can turn dysfunctional teams into cohesive, high performing groups.  Michele and McCarthy Technologies had a positive impact on my career and I utilize tools they provided to me on a daily basis.

Michele has insight that is invaluable to any organization trying to build better teams and to elevate their organization to the 10th level of greatness.

Director of Major Giving
June 16, 2008, Kimberly was a client of Michele’s

Michele McCarthy is fantastic!  Michele and her partner and led "BootCamp" (think re-booting your brain) at Harvey Mudd College.  Although we were a small group, they brought employees so there was a more than ample staff-to-attendee ratio.  They were creative and totally flexible.  They scheduled the four-day long leadership training in such a way that it was during students break.  The methods they teach eliminate faulty/flawed decision making and teach participants to choose the BEST ideas for the project to get it completed on time.  If you want your team to be completely positive and activated, and your work teams to be the best they can, then run to her next training.

Degerhan Usluel
Partner at Usluel Group
April 30, 2008, Degerhan was a client of Michele’s

“How come we don’t fight anymore”, asked a long-time colleague, after what to outsiders might seem like an ‘intense fight bordering on a mild beating’.I realized that for the first time, I (and everyone in my team) was truly aware of what we were doing: intentionally moving towards creating a great product. Anyone who has been there knows what a joyful experience that is. But to create that experience with every project – well that was new.See, we had an edge. We used a platform called The Core, distilled by Michele and Jim McCarthy over hundreds of experiments with actual teams creating/building stuff.The Core enabled arbitrary groups of people to rally behind an idea (not the usual manipulative corporate mission stuff, I am talking about real people, really owning an idea), to harness conflict, to decide unanimously, and to make things happen. And sometimes (more often than you can imagine), create something great & lasting.Michele was a key in my learning and internalizing The Core in both my work and personal life (my kids love it). She is focused on results, is an excellent observer, and asks the one critical question that changes the flow of ideas, and helps me find the solution to a conundrum.Michele is a trusted advisor, and now a dear friend of our family. I would recommend her coaching to any organization creating brainware, and to anyone in a leadership role, without any reservations.
Degerhan Usluel

Movement Strategist at Neurohacker Collective
September 24, 2012, Michele worked with Venessa in different groups

When I first met Venessa she asked me for help. It was an extraordinary experience for me. The help she needed was essentially support for how to deal with her extraordinary gifts and situation. She had, through her beautiful writing and engaging charisma quickly amassed a Facebook group of thousands. She was noodling over what to do next. (This was the surprising, exciting part for me). Since then we have spent many hours together talking about this and other projects and interests of hers. Venessa is a gifted writer and a builder of communities. She also is humble and carefully assesses her own personal growth on a daily basis. She is brave and willing to make changes in her life for the better. I would recommend Venessa for any project or job that she wants to do. Her track record shows that she is destined for greatness.

summary: Email me to talk about creating a culture of greatness and innovation. Or email me if you need someone who can manage people and projects: michele@mccarthy.netI love to build things and build teams that build things.I also love advising leaders who share my passion to create magnificent organizations, projects, and worlds. The invention and design of GREAT technologies has always been a passion of mine.Some projects/technologies I would love to work on are:Space TravelAerospaceGreen TechnologiesDisaster Prevention in AerospaceOpen Source Satellite InitiativeSafe nuclear energyEliminating prejudice and other harm against womenSpecialties: Project Management (including Agile/Scrum/Core Protocols)Culture Design and Culture HackerCorporate Culture DesignSpeaker at many Agile, Scrum, Open Space Conferences worldwideLeading Large OrganizationsHow to make Agile and Scrum adoptions workRunning a Teamwork Lab for more than 19 yearsCoaching High Potential LeadersPodcast Co-HostMergers of Corporate CulturesChanging Corporate Culture to Intentional State of GreatnessDelivering Great Products and Services On Time or EarlyCustomized 360 ReviewsBoss/Employee RelationsTurnaroundsCreating Results-Focused CultureCustomized Leadership Training ProgramsUI Design
